name: Rough In: All Mains, range pipes & sprinklers installed?
Air Test: Pressurized air test for a period of 30 mins (if applicable)
Water Test: Pressure test to 1200Kpa for duration of 1.5 hours
Fit Off: Check all sprinklers have been fitted off
Plates & heights check: Escuteon plates & heights of sprinklers are all ok
Rough In: All Mains & isolation valves?
Fit Off: Check all milcoks / FHR ball valves are installed
Air Test: Pressurized air test for a period of 30 mins (if applicable)
Water Test: Pressure test to 1200Kpa for duration of 1.5 hours
FHR: All FHR been bled from excess air & proof of water
